meanings.sent1: The painting depicted an archangelic figure with majestic wings.
meanings.sent2: The cathedral was adorned with archangelic statues guarding the entrance.
meanings.sent3: The archangelic choir sang heavenly melodies that echoed through the halls.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness and grace had an archangelic quality that touched everyone around her.
meanings.sent5: The archangelic aura surrounding him made people feel safe and protected.

meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of an archangel.
meanings.sent1: The child's innocent face had an archangelic purity that melted hearts.
meanings.sent2: The warrior's bravery on the battlefield was truly archangelic.
meanings.sent3: The archangelic smile on her face made even the grumpiest person smile back.
meanings.sent4: His archangelic presence seemed to bring a sense of peace wherever he went.
meanings.sent5: The archangelic light shining through the clouds was a sight to behold.
